name: Keka
description:
It all began with the frustration of using software that sucks. Prior to starting Keka, our core teams was a 100 person business that needed an easy to use software for managing employees. We looked everywhere and all we found were software that was lousy and hard to use. We felt SME businesses in India deserved something better. Something awesome actually! 
The goal was simple. Automate and simplify people processes so you can focus on your core asset - the employees. They, in turn, will transform you from a good to a great organization!
Headline: On a mission to create awesome employee experiences!
ShortDescription: Keka is your people enabler. From automation of people processes to creating an engaged and driven culture, Keka is all you need to build a good to great company.
enhanced_description: Keka is a comprehensive HR technology platform designed for Small and Medium-sized Enterprises (SMEs) in India. Born out of the frustration with complex and inefficient HR software, Keka's core mission is to automate and simplify people processes, enabling organizations to focus on their employees and build a highly engaged and driven culture. The platform aims to create awesome employee experiences, thereby helping businesses transform from good to great by improving overall employee happiness and engagement.
key_use_cases: Automating and simplifying HR people processes
Managing employee lifecycle from hiring to exit
Processing payroll and managing employee expenses
Facilitating remote workforce management and time tracking
Optimizing and automating the hiring process
Screening and assessing candidates during recruitment
Analyzing HR data for better decision-making
competitive_advantages: Ease of use (designed to be user-friendly, contrasting with 'lousy and hard to use' alternatives)
Focus on automating and simplifying HR processes to free up HR's time
Strong emphasis on improving employee experience, happiness, and engagement
Aims to transform organizational culture from 'good to great' through people enablement
hr_functions_supported: Pre-employment Screening (Background Check, Testing, Reference Check)
roi_benefits: Increased efficiency through automation and simplification of people processes
Streamlined HR operations, allowing focus on core assets (employees)
Better decision-making through HR analytics (implied by feature)
primary_users: Employees (for self-service, leave, attendance, expenses, experience platforms)
Team Managers (for performance management, workforce oversight)
Recruiters (for applicant tracking and hiring processes)
Business Leaders/Owners (for strategic insights and culture building)
